title: The Peace makers: 1919
creator_credit: Peter Baylis, BBC-TV and Associated British-Pathe
brief_description: Highlights some of the events immediately following the end of World War I, such as the Versailles Peace Treaty Conference, the return of soldiers to America and Britain, the Great Victory Parade in London and the crossing of the Atlantic by Alcock and Brown. Narrated by Sir Ralph Richardson. Suitable for upper secondary level.
